```{r bfcW-A, echo=FALSE}
askMC(
  prompt = "What is $\\vec{C}^T\\cdot\\vec{D}$?",
  -8, "+0+", 6, 10, 14, 16, 24, 30, 34, 40, 42,
  random_answer_order = FALSE,
  allow_retry = FALSE
  #QC
  )
```
